name: Psycho (Ali Mattar.Company)
description:
STORY

Tommy is a therapist sent his patient to Redrose Eastwood hospital for treatment and he finds himself in a situation where he has to understand his patient's mind to get himself out of a sinister house!

GAMEPLAY

Psycho is a survival horror game, a first person experience playing the story of two main characters, a psychopath and his doctor to figure out the cause and the treatment in 3 chapters. Solving puzzles and explore the truth.

Follow Psycho Now!

Note: when you download the game for the first time you will notice the Voice and Music are at Zero! To Fix this go to option and Raise them up.
